scripts.watch-all: concurrently -n core,table,spec,dynamic,form -c blue,green,yellow,red,cyan "ng build praxis-core --configuration development --poll=2000" "ng build praxis-table --configuration development --poll=2000" "ng build praxis-specification --watch --configuration development --poll=2000" "ng build praxis-dynamic-fields --configuration development --poll=2000" "ng build praxis-dynamic-form --configuration development --poll=2000"
scripts.dev: concurrently -n libs,app -c cyan,magenta "npm run watch-all" "ng serve --configuration development --port 4003"
